title: Gamification-Based Decision-Making Education Program for Prenatal Screening

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational genetic concepts and general understanding of prenatal testing
context.additional_context: Gamified educational environment based on the ARCS model for in-service professionals, utilizing digital devices (tablets/smartphones)

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain the basic principles and clinical applications of prenatal testing (especially NIPT) in over 80% of cases.
Learners complete simulation games interpreting genetic test results and decision-making processes with over 90% accuracy.
Learners reduce decision-making conflicts related to prenatal testing by over 50% through ARCS model-based activities.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
